resources.string: This short quiz is about interesting facts about Solar System.\nLet\'s begin.
What is the name of closest star to Earth?
Is that true what on Venus day lasts longer than Venus year?
Which of these planets are with rings?
Mercury is the hottest planet in our Solar system (on the surface)?
Jupiter is twice as massive as all the other system planets combined
Was Neptune known to the ancients as planet (before year 1700)?
The densest planet in our Solar System is?
You got total %s of 8 quiz questions right!
